ygData.subject: Re: Harrasment and E'Ci...
ygData.msgSnippet: David and all, I have my server ready to roll and can host the website directly from here. The site address is not set went but will getting a domian soon. I
ygData.messageBody:
David and all,

I have my server ready to roll and can host the website directly from here.
The site address is not set went but will getting a domian soon. I have
obtained cold fusion so the databse idea for members to place their
characters, server and stats upon the site should be easily setup and going.
I have secured the real information behind my secure wall and will be
accessible by password and username. I hate to do this but to keep people
from being harassed it would be the best way.

Here is a list of ideas I have about adding to the site.

Message Board
Possible Chat room for real-time conversation
Guild Members Database
This will include

Character Name
Level
Race
Class
Server
email address

Also have the idea about placing a skill section so you can specify the
skill you have and what levels, could be helpful for a tailor looking to get
items enchanted by an Enchanter. This will help to get guild member out to
assist others in there adventures. The email address can be used to allow
others to contact you about the services they may require of a specific
character. I will place a way to search the listings for specific
information and whether someone wishes to provide these services.

Let me know if there are any other ideas that you may want to see added to
the site. The base site can be available pretty quickly but the advanced
items will take sometime to complete. If anyone wishes to help please let me
know, I will gladly accept any assist. We will need graphics and if we can
devise a logo that would be great.

Lastly, David I will gladly take on the role of guild master or officer for
the E'Ci server. I am on quite regularly and my character is a decent level
so I can get pretty much anywhere (as long as I sneak about, LOL). Let me
know what I can do to help.

I have been staying in Northern Ro mostly so anyone in that area, give me a
tell. To all of you I just want to say that if you ever need anything in the
game let me know I will be more than glad to do what I can!

May prosperity be in all your endeavors,

Chris
(Marlys on E'Ci)

-----Original Message-----
From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, September 10, 1999 3:29 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Harrasment and E'Ci...


>From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
>
>>If I see him online, I am tempted to do a tell to him and tell him I saw
>their
>>web site, and am very supportive of gay people and wish his guild luck
>>(pretending I'm straight of course.) He may decide to delete the thing
>himself
>>if I do that. If I do it, I'll be sure to /log first to record everything
for
>>you all to see.
>
>Ooooo! Ooooo! I could do it. But on a more serious note wouldn't without
>your knowing or in the middle of GM discussions ...
>
>And on the website, great! I wonder if I can bug a friend and see what
>royalty free graphics we can dig up ... I also can do Logo-type graphics
>and have had some companies and groups use mine before, I still have my
>graphics package (I bought it). If anyone has freehand graphics though, I
>do have a scanner and can scan if they are sent to me and get it in a
>variety of graphics formats (as well as photo touch-up work, etc ...).
>
>- Lora
>
>
>
